summary: Detail-oriented and solution-driven Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud-native systems, and DevOps. Adept in Python, Java/Spring Boot, JavaScript, and AWS, with a strong foundation in designing and deploying scalable software solutions. Proven ability to work independently on end-to-end feature development, from definition to deployment. Experience includes maintaining healthcare systems with high uptime and implementing automation to streamline operations. Committed to writing clean, well-documented code while collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments.

points: Supported mission-critical healthcare applications (TruCare, QlikView) achieving ”98%” system uptime by proactively monitoring more than 100 scheduled Control-M jobs daily.
Diagnosed and resolved application incidents, cutting average response time by 15% through root-cause analysis and SQL data fixes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tune Informatica Cloud pipelines, improving data load performance by 20%.
Documented standard operating procedures for L2 support, enabling faster onboarding of new team members.
Closed 120+ ServiceNow tickets within SLA, improving average resolution time by 20%.
Automated recurring health checks and job monitoring scripts in Python, reducing manual effort 10%.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

education.institution: Geetanjali College of Engineering and Technology

projects.location: Geethanjali College of Engineering, Hyderabad, India
projectDetails: Developed and designed Smart Home Automation where we take existing appliances to online. It specifically focuses on the development of a user friendly IOT based home automation system that is able to control various components inside home via internet
System consists of mobile app which was developed in flutter where u can control the home applications through the app
Integration with Voice Assistants like Google Assistant, Alexa. Where u can control the home applications using the devices which support these voice assistants

projects.location: Geethanjali College of Engineering, Hyderabad, India
projectDetails: Developed an Emotion Recognition System using YOLO3 and TensorFlow where the model can recognise different types of emotions
Designed a web interface using Django framework
Capturing the users emotions using OpenCV and sending it the model feed. This CNN model here predicts the emotions  from the images and then recommends songs based on these predicted emotions
Based on these prediction user is then recommened songs on websites like YouTube, Spotify, Amazon Prime Music using their API’s

certifications.name: ITIL Foundation Certificate in IT Service Management
